param.label: Connect Type
param.description: Wheather to create users automatically or let them choose!
param.option: Users can choose username or link account on next page.

param.description: If email exists in users table, this will auto link a Facebook User with existing joomla account.
param.option: Auto link if email matches with existing joomla user.

param.option: 0 (Not recommended, users might not be able to register if another same username exist.)
